name: moneymoney-sankey
description: An extension for the great MoneyMoney app to export an HTML Sankey Chart based on the transaction categories
author: Christoph Massmann <chris@dev-investor.de>

scripts.build: mkdir -p $npm_package_config_outputDir && cp src/SankeyChart.lua $npm_package_config_outputDir && INLINE_CSS=`npm run build:css --silent` INLINE_JS=`npm run build:js --silent` node ./build.js
scripts.test:placeholder: grep -qE '{{ ([a-zA-Z_]+) }}' $npm_package_config_outputDir/*.lua && (echo 'ERROR: Placeholders have not been replaced in dist!' && exit 1) || exit 0
